posts.title: Klute (1971)
posts.excerpt: “With her Oscar-winning turn in Klute, Jane Fonda reinvented herself as a new kind of movie star. posts.title: Oretachi no chi ga yurusanai
posts.excerpt: Though Suzuki created it in the midst of his stylistic breakthrough, «Our Blood Will Not Forgive» has never received the same amount of attention as other films he made around the same time. posts._title: Vladimir Kobrin – …Absolyutno iz nichego… AKA Absolutely from Nothing (1997)
posts.title: …Absolyutno iz nichego…
posts.excerpt: The story of this film began 16th of November, 1974. When a encrypted radio transmission was sent from Earth to inhabitants of extraterrestrial world…The film’s name Kobrin took from Hegel’s “Philosophy of Religion”. But now, Kobrin granted the ability to speak to the “kitchen” philosopher – Semen Semenych.From nothing to… Homo Insanicus.

posts._title: Pierre Étaix – Le soupirant AKA The Suitor (1962)
posts.title: Le soupirant
posts.excerpt: Quote:Pierre Etaix’s first feature introduces the droll humor and oddball charm of its unique writer-director-star. posts.title: Yoyo

posts._title: Pawel Pawlikowski – My Summer of Love (2004)
posts.title: My Summer of Love
posts.excerpt: Quote:In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona (Press) meets the exotic, pampered Tasmin (Blunt). Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.
